group_1.narration: Of what? Coming to grips with what@happened to Kanae and Mel?

group_1.textLeft: Kanae!

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo...
Bring me with you... Show me the future.
I feel like...you can do it.
Because you're...vital to the team...

group_1.textLeft: I thought today was supposed to be lucky.@What kind of luck is this?

group_1.textRight: No, it is lucky... I...m-managed to save @you, Yachiyo-senpai...
I saved...the leader I look up to so much...@I'm...really happy...I did...

group_1.narration: I've accepted what happened in the past.
Even if my wish wasn't what caused@their deaths, I led them to that fate.

group_1.textCenter: You don't have to be so scared.

group_1.narration: What would I be scared of?

group_1.textLeft: It's scary, of course it is.
Who wouldn't feel that way? It's so@terrifying that anyone would shudder.

group_1.textRight: Who are you?

group_1.textLeft: It's me...
You are I...and I am you. You should@understand that much.

group_1.textRight: But that doesn't make any sense. I'm not@afraid of anything...
I've already made peace with all my fears@and regrets.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I've accepted all of that.
I've accepted that I've been punching tickets@for girls heading to their deaths...
I lead them to a train, destined to alight@at their demise...
But, it's so frightening...

group_1.textRight: What is?
You said that you...that I accepted all of this.@What is there left to be afraid of?

group_1.textLeft: The future...
The future is terrifying.

group_1.textRight: The future?

group_1.textLeft: Try to remember...
What have I been doing since those two@passed away?

group_1.textRight: I tried to stop girls who were about to@become Magical Girls from doing so.
And tried to help Magical Girls in danger.

group_1.textLeft: Now I can chase you out of this town@without any distractions.

group_1.textRight: Chase me out of town...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, you made it clear...
You don't have what it takes to survive@here.

group_1.textRight: And when Magical Girls tried to get involved@in what was happening in Kamihama...
I did everything in my power to stop them.

group_1.textLeft: That was all lessons from my past...
They were the clumsy, selfish acts of someone@who believed her wish killed her friends.
I feared my own wish and worked alone. I@even made others suffer because of it.
I clung to my past, in the form of Mifuyu...

group_1.textRight: But things are going to be different now!
I've given myself another chance! I have to@face the future!

group_1.textLeft: And yet I'm at a standstill...

group_1.textRight: Of course ruining this chance at redemption@would be scary to think about!

group_1.textLeft: See, you are scared.
You're scared of opening that box and being@confronted with their final words...

group_1.textRight: I used to think I might find out how they@really felt back then.
That's why I couldn't open it...

group_1.textLeft: This time, though, doing so will give me@closure.
And after I see what they left, I'll have@to leave them behind and move on...
That's what I'm so afraid of...[chara:100203:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100203:motion_100][chara:100203:cheek_-1][chara:100203:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100203:lipSynch_1]isn't it?
I think...it's all right to be afraid.

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: I am the one bound by my past. Bound by@the wish I made...

group_1.textRight: But that would mean I don't believe in the@chance Iroha gave me.

group_1.textLeft: Then let's punch another ticket...

group_1.textRight: What?
Ugh...

group_1.narration: — ??? —@If I can't believe in this chance, that would@mean my wish really does kill people.
— ??? —@We need to accept that...@And punch those tickets.
— ??? —@Tickets bound for death...@Come help me punch them...

group_1.textCenter: So this is what's preoccupying me...
I don't have faith in my own future.
